summary:
Add a crew member to the Khajiit caravan.
Add 5 Khajiit and 2 horses to each of the three caravans.
All five Khajiit to be added are merchants.
Expand the six campgrounds according to the number of people.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#d9ead3][color=#d9d2e9][size=5]Latest information[/size][/color]

[color=#ffffff][size=4]Ver1.00[/size][/color]
Initial release

[color=#cfe2f3][size=5]About PDCaravanExtension.[/size][/color]

Add a crew member to the Khajiit caravan.
Add 5 Khajiit and 2 horses to each of the three caravans.
All five Khajiit to be added are merchants.
Expand the six campgrounds according to the number of people.
[img width=1144,height=643]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88677/88677-1514737591-778434719.jpeg[/img]
[img width=1144,height=644]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88677/88677-1514737603-690906461.jpeg[/img]

[color=#fce5cd][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]
It recommended the introduction of the MO or NMM.
Clean Save and New Game is not particularly necessary.

[color=#f4cccc][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color]
Dawnguard HearthFires Dragonborn[/color]
author: puratina
